This panel let's you chose any Glyph zone as a "Essential" notification: tap on a Glyph zone, select a contact and every time you get a notification from that contact the Glyph will stay on until you swipe or answer the notification. To do this you need to allow the app to read notifications and to read your contacts.

By attempting to allow the permission a 'Restricted settings' dialog will popup, to allow the permission head into the Settings app -> Apps -> Glyphify -> three dots, then go back to Glyphify to allow the permission.
The three dots won't appear until the 'Restricted settings' popup is shown.
